channel.title: CVE Feed for Ericsson -- Ericsson RAN Compute Basebands (all BB variants)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ericsson -- Ericsson RAN Compute Basebands (all BB variants)

item.title: CVE-2024-25008|2024-08-16T09:42:21.010Z -- ericsson -- ericsson%20ran%20compute%20basebands%20%28all%20bb%20variants%29
item.description: Ericsson RAN Compute and Site Controller 6610 contains a vulnerability in the Control System where Improper Input Validation can lead to arbitrary code execution, for example to obtain a Linux Shell with the same privileges as the attacker. The attacker would require elevated privileges for example a valid OAM user having the system administrator role to exploit the vulnerability.
